TravelTriangle > Blog > Andaman > 20 Best Hotels And Resorts In Andaman That Fit Under Every Budget 20 Best Hotels And Resorts In Andaman That Fit Under Every Budget .. SHARES Updated Date: 21 January 2025 It is no surprise that a holiday in Andaman is one of the best experiences that you can have in your life. Other than sun kissed beaches, turquoise sea, and swaying palm trees, the place has some of the resorts and hotels to suit every budget. From friendly hospitality to luxurious services, these places offer it all and suit every traveller’s needs. So, here’s a list of most popular hotels and resorts in Andaman for every budget! Table Of Content Luxury Hotels & Resorts In Andaman (More Than INR 6,000) Andaman has a plethora of options for you if the budget is something that doesn’t concern you at all. From utmost privacy to homelike comfort, here’s what’s in store for you at the top luxury resort. Take a look at all the world-class hotels in andaman with tariff that will be well within your budget. 1. Barefoot At Havelock Awesome food, great sea views, surrounded by lush green trees, Barefoot at Havelock is easily the most idyllic among all Andaman hotels. Take a pick from the 25 elegantly designed and luxurious cottages or villas and experience nature at its best! Ideal For: Families and HoneymoonersBest Experiences: One of a kind Ayurvedic treatment at the Barefoot Ayurvedic Wellness Centre Explore the coral reefs under the clear sea water while scuba diving in Andaman You can go Line fishing from a traditional boat or Rod fishing from custom made speedboat Tariff: Starting from INR 11,800 (on double-sharing basis)Location: Beach N0. 7, Radhanagar Village, Havelock Island, Andaman Islands, Andaman and Nicobar Islands, 744211Ratings & Reviews  101 Places To Visit In India Before You Turn 30 Andaman Holiday Packages On TravelTriangle Indulge in snorkeling or scuba diving to see magnificent coral reefs or stay in beach resorts at Havelock island. Visit Port Blair, Ross Islands, Neil Islands, Gandhi marine park, and Cellular Jail. Book memorable holiday packages on TravelTriangle. Book Now See more at TRAVELTRIANGLE.COM Visit Website 2. Silver Sand Havelock Flanked by swaying palm trees, overlooking the vast sea, Silver Sand Beach Resort is one of the most idyllic and charming beach resorts in Andaman. With its 39 luxurious AC cottages, lagoons and suites, set beautifully by the Vijay Nagar Beach it is an amazing option for couples and families. Ideal For: Families and HoneymoonersBest Experiences: You can enjoy various activities at the private beach including scuba diving and snorkelling Sit at the beach and test your skills at angling Boat rides are also arranged from the resort One of the best luxury hotels in Andaman, they offer exceptional sea food at their multi cuisine restaurant, ZOLA Tariff: Starting from INR 12,600 (on double-sharing basis)Location: No. 5, Vijay Nagar Beach, Havelock Island, Andaman and Nicobar Islands 744101Hotel Website | Ratings & Reviews 3. Fortune Resort Bay Island Settled on the edge of the untouched, lush rainforest islands, Fortune Resort Bay Island is one of the best hotels in Andaman overlooking the turquoise blue waters of the Bay of Bengal. Reflecting the innate locale of the islands, this charming resort is built in the native, Padauk wood; a classy red timber that is found exclusively in Andaman Islands. Ideal For: Families and HoneymoonersBest Experiences: Indulge in the wide range of delicacies including fresh seafood at Mandalay- an open deck restaurant with stunning sea view Enjoy a relaxing swim at the sea view swimming pool of Fortune Resort bay Kids can have fun at the games room Tariff: Starting from INR 9,000 (on double-sharing basis)Location: Marine Hill, Port Blair, Andaman and Nicobar Islands 744101Hotel Website | Ratings & Reviews  60 Best Honeymoon Destinations In India! 4. SeaShell Resort Situated on the top of Marine Hill, this resort is a classic retreat to celebrate the good moments of your trip. With palms and scenic sights of the Port Blair around, this place will pamper you to the core with its all-inclusive modern day amenities. All in all, this is a great place to stay from the bustling city life. Ideal For: Honeymooners and familyBest Experiences: The resort offers soothing views of the ocean. The resort can arrange a get-together or a celebration for you on request. Tariff: Starting from INR 10,800(on double-sharing basis)Location: Marine Hill, Port Blair, Andaman and Nicobar IslandsHotel Website | Ratings & Reviews 5. Symphony Palms Beach Resort With over 100 elegantly built cottages, this resort offers an experience of a lifetime. While staying here, you can not only close and personal with nature but also relax in its lap like a baby. Apart from all the luxurious facilities, the beach at the front is also a great place to entertain and pamper yourself. Ideal For: Couples, family, and friendsBest Experiences: Go for a blissful stroll by the beach. Indulge and pamper yourself with a relaxing spa therapy. Tariff: Starting from INR 7,489(on double-sharing basis)Location:3, Govind Nagar Beach, Havelock Island, Andaman, and Nicobar IslandsHotel Website | Ratings & Reviews  Honeymoon In Andaman: A Handy Guide With Legit Tips, First-Hand Experiences And More 6. Taj Exotica Resort & Spa  Located on the stunning Radhanagar beach, spread across an area of 46 acres this property in Andamans is the perfect getaway spot for you and your partner. Away from all the hustle bustle, this property has 54 luxury villas and is known for it’s lush green surroundings.  Ideal For: Couples, family, and friendsBest Experiences: Go for a blissful stroll by the pool. Indulge and pamper yourself with a relaxing spa therapy. Tariff: Starting from INR 27,00(on double-sharing basis)Location: Radha Nagar Beach Number 7, Andaman and Nicobar Islands 744211Hotel Website | Ratings & Reviews Mid-Range Hotels & Resorts In Andaman (INR 3,000 to INR 6,000) With so many mid-range hotels and resorts, Andaman has something for every pocket size. Here’s a list of the best places to stay without burning a hole in your pocket. 7. The Wild Orchid Resort The quaint and laid back resort, Wild Orchid is situated between the aqua blue waters of the Bay of Bengal and the jade green hills of Havelock. It is one of the best mid-range resorts in Andaman and Nicobar and a favourite among foreign travellers. The resort is built in authentic Andamanese style with spacious cottages with thatched roofs. Ideal For: Couples, Foreigners, groupsBest Experiences: The Red Snapper restaurant is a favourite among the tourists and people come here to dine regardless of their being guest of the resort. The Emerald Gecko Bar and the Clownfish Café are also amazing places to hang out There’s also a Fat Martin’s South Indian Corner for those who prefers veggie food Scuba instructors are also available to take you on an underwater trip Tariff: Starting from INR 6,200 (on double-sharing basis)Location: Vijay Nagar (No.5), Havelock Island, Andaman and Nicobar Islands 744211Hotel Website | Ratings & Reviews 8. Blue Bird Resort Bluebird is a lovely beach resort located in Havelock ideal for all kinds of travelers. Traditional décor and the quintessential Andamanese cottages will win your heart the moment you walk in. The laid back yet vibrant ambiance is something that puts them apart from all Andaman Nicobar resorts. Ideal For: Couples, Foreigners, groups, backpackersBest Experiences: The multi cuisine restaurant serves an exceptional fare that you will absolutely enjoy The Radhanagar Beach in Havelock is just a speedboat ride away Tariff: Starting from INR 4,700 (on double-sharing basis)Location: Vijay Nagar, Beach No. 5, Havelock Island, South Andaman, Andaman and Nicobar Islands, 744211Hotel Website | Ratings & Reviews  Over 15 Romantic Beach Resorts In India For The Summer Of Love 9. Sinclairs Bayview This charming beachfront hotel is truly one of the 5-star hotels in Andaman offering some of the most spectacular views of the sea. Settled at South point in Port Blair, Sinclairs Bayview is like a wonderland for nature lovers. The refreshing environs and the gorgeous decor will make you want to stay there forever. Ideal For: Families, Honeymooners and CouplesBest Experiences: Couples can spend romantic evenings at the terrace of the hotel with great food and drinks while enjoying the feel of open sea Feel the cool sea breeze and hear the sound of waves from the covered deck of the hotel A Bunker dating back to the World War II is located inside the hotel, with its canon still in place! Tariff: Starting from INR 12,975 (on double-sharing basis)Location: Corbyn’s Cove Road, South Point, Shadipur, Port Blair, Andaman and Nicobar Islands 744106Hotel Website | Ratings & Reviews 10. Dolphin Resort Havelock Located at the beautiful Vijay Nagar beach on Havelock Island, this is a great place to stay on a trip to Andaman. It is an ideal accommodation option for nature lovers. Run by Tourism Department, this resort has both deluxe and super deluxe rooms available. Ideal For: Couple, FamiliesBest Experiences: The pristine Vijay Nagar Beach is a stone’s throw away Tariff: Starting from INR 4,800 (on double-sharing basis)Location: Vijaynagar Beach, Havelock Island 744101 IndiaRatings & Reviews  How Spending 6 Days In Andaman Gave Our Married Life A Great Start And Was Perfect! 11. TSG Blue Resort With its elegantly designed spacious rooms, this is yet another mid-range resort in Andaman for a family staycation. From its great restaurant to well-equipped rooms, everything about this place is exquisite. If you wish to get away from the modern world yet have access to all the facilities, this is the place to be. Ideal For: Couples and familyBest Experiences: Do dine at the resort’s restaurant that serves delicious food. Take a walk in the morning on the lush green grass for a refreshing start to the day. Tariff: Starting from INR 6,200 (on double-sharing basis)Location: SH4, Govind Nagar, Andaman and Nicobar IslandsHotel Website | Ratings & Reviews 12. Pearl Park Beach Resort Situated in Neil Island, this property is one of the best 4 star hotels in Andaman designed to offer you every kind of comfort and luxury. The resort property is located about 3 km away from the Jetty, so getting here will be easy-peasy. The hotel has various sea facing huts and cottages which give awesome panoramic views of the ocean as well as the sunsets. The rooms are equipped with all modern amenities while giving guests the feeling of staying in a beautiful forest. Ideal For: Honeymooners, families with kidsBest Experiences: With its unique Triangular Sea-View, this property offers some of the best views from its porch. The restaurants offer a variety of cuisines from around the world. Tariff: Starting from INR 4,000 (on double-sharing basis)Location: Pearl Park Beach Resort is located at Beach No. 1, Lakshmanpur Beach, Neil Island, Andaman and Nicobar Islands 744104Reviews 13. Megapode Resort The fascinating property is spread over an area of 7.5 acres of manicured lawns and offers absolutely stunning views of the Bay of Bengal as well as the Port Blair harbor. Megapode Resort is the perfect choice of stay for you and your loved ones for a comfortable and memorable stay in the lap of nature. While here, you’ll get to enjoy modern amenities, quick service, awesome food, and breathtaking views of Andaman unlike anywhere else on this island. It’s the best place to stay for all homely comforts as well as endless luxury. These are just some of the reasons why this hotel is amongst the best 3 star hotels in Andaman. Ideal For: Nature lovers, familiesBest Experiences: The property offers guided tours to nearby places. It is set in untouched natural surroundings. Tariff: Starting from INR 5,000 (on double-sharing basis)Location: Megapode Resorts is located at Delanipur, Port Blair, Andaman and Nicobar Islands 744102Reviews 14. Peerless Sarovar Portico If you’re searching for that perfect dreamy abode that will offer all luxurious amenities in a dirt cheap price, then you should stay at Peerless Sarovar Portico. This is amongst the best 5 star hotels in Andaman which is known for offering guests the best accommodation facilities and world-class services in a lavish setting. Located on the beautiful Corbyn’s Cove Beach, this resort offers the best views of the ocean as well as a serene ambience unlike anywhere else in the city. You’ll love spending time amidst its rich green surroundings and swaying coconut trees. You can also indulge in the various beach activities here like banana boat rides, jet skiing, parasailing, and much more. Ideal For: Beach lovers, adventure seekersBest Experiences: You can try various water sports at the beach of the resort. You can enjoy uninterrupted views of the vast ocean from your verandah. Tariff: Starting from INR 5,000 (on double-sharing basis)Location: Peerless Sarovar Portico is located at Corbyn’s Cove, Port Blair, Andaman and Nicobar Islands 744101Reviews 15. Sun Sea Resort Located far away from the maddening chaos and clutter of daily life, the Sun Sea Resort is among the best hotels in Andaman for honeymoon couples. Offering comfort, luxury, great food, and the best views on one platter, this is the perfect choice for your accommodation. The resort’s multi-cuisine in-house restaurant Ha-O serves a range of Indian, Continental, and Chinese dishes and is a total hit amongst foodies who stay at this resort. Couples can also head out for a bit of sightseeing and see places like the Corbyn’s Cove Beach, Havelock Island, Long Island, Neil Island, Viper Island, and Rangat located close to the property. Ideal For: HoneymoonersBest Experiences: You can hang out at the in-house bar for a variety of drinks and beverages. You can opt for their sightseeing tours and see famous attractions in Andaman. Tariff: Starting from INR 3,000 (on double-sharing basis)Location: Sun Sea Resort is located at MG Road, Middle Point, Port Blair, Andaman and Nicobar Islands 744101Reviews Planning your holiday in Andaman but confused about what to do? Read More See more at TRAVELTRIANGLE.COM Visit Website Budget Hotels & Resorts In Andaman (Less Than INR 3,000) Wish to stay at some pocket-friendly place? Worry not, Andaman won’t disappoint. Here’s a list of the top hotels and resorts that offer a budget stay. Take a look! 16. Tango Beach Resort, Neil Island Located on Beach no. 1 of Neil Island Tango Beach Resort is one of the best resorts in Andaman for budget travelers who are looking for maximum facilities at a reasonable price. The resort and restaurant faces the sea and it breezes the entire season. Ideal For: Budget travellers, couples, groupsBest Experiences: Indulge in a romantic dinner with your better half at the charming restaurant of the resort The proximity to the beach makes it a splendid place for swimming, snorkelling, fishing and scuba diving There are guided jungle trekking that you can take Tariff: Starting from INR 1,200 (on double-sharing basis)Location: Lakshmanpur, Beach No.1, Neil Island, Andaman and Nicobar Islands 744104Hotel Website | Ratings & Reviews  10 Fascinating Places To Wake Up On Your First Anniversary 17. Cross Bill Beach Resort Cross Bills Resort has a collection of tiny AC and non AC cottages with all necessary amenities for their guests. Just like all other Andaman hotels and resorts you’ll get amazing sea food fare at this resort as well. Ideal For: Budget travellers, couples, groupsBest Experiences: The hotel staff will arrange scuba diving and snorkelling tours for you Enjoy the delicious food Tariff: Starting from INR 1,500 (on double-sharing basis)Location: SH5, Govind Nagar, Andaman and Nicobar IslandsHotel Website | Ratings & Reviews 18. Marina Manor Located in Port Blair, this property provides comfortable rooms for travelers. With close proximity to Aberdeen Clock Tower, Cellular Jail and Corbyn’s Cove, this 3 star hotel is a perfect abode for those looking for all the facilities and affordable prices. Ideal For: Budget travellers, backpackers, business travellersBest Experiences: Good food at cheap rates Centrally located in Port Blair Tariff: Starting from INR 3,400 (on double-sharing basis)Location: Thomas Colony, Junglighat, Port Blair, Andaman and Nicobar Islands 744101 Hotel Website | Ratings & Reviews  47 Most Amazing Things To Do In Andaman That Travelers Cannot Miss! 19. Havelock Island Beach Resort Renowned for its beautiful sand beaches and mesmerizing green canopy, Havelock Island Beach Resort offers world class amenities for its guests. Its sea facing suites give a unique holidaying experience. It is certainly a paradise for its guests Ideal For: Families, Honeymoon couplesBest Experiences: Lavish stay experience Water sports and adventure activities arranged by the hotel staff Tariff: Starting from INR 6,470 (on double-sharing basis)Location: Govind Nagar Beach Havelock Island, Andaman and Nicobar Islands 744211 Hotel Website | Ratings & Reviews 20.  Summer Sands Beach Resort An ideal retreat, Summer Sands Beach Resort is for anyone who is looking for a peaceful and luxury stay in Neil Island. Spread across 15acres of lush greens, the resort offers 2 and 3 bedroom villas for families. Lot of guests return to this property for its sprawling lawns and serenity. Ideal For: Families, Honeymoon couplesBest Experiences: 3 Swimming pools for recreation Experience the ‘Bonhomie’ aura Popular for Sea Food Tariff: Starting from INR 8,250 (on double-sharing basis)Location: Ram Nagar Neil Island, 744104 Neil Island Hotel Website | Ratings & Reviews  53 Best Places To Visit In Andaman For A Mesmerizing Holiday Experience A mesmerizing holiday in Andaman on your mind? Pick one of these value-for-money hotels and resorts in Andaman, and get going to live a dreamy beach vacation! We’re sure you’ll have a fantastic staycation in this paradise with your loved ones! For our editorial codes of conduct and copyright disclaimer, please click here Frequently Asked Questions About Hotels And Resorts In Andaman What is the best time to visit Andaman? The months from October to May happens to be the best time to visit Andaman and Nicobar Islands for all types of travelers. What are the must-visit attractions in Andaman? The Cellular Jail, Havelock Island, Radhanagar Beach, The Elephant’s Beach, and Neil Island, are some of the best places to visit in Andaman. What is one of the best experiences in Andaman? Scuba diving is one of the best experiences that serve as an ultimate adventure in the clear waters and is not to be missed by anyone when in Andaman. What is the best time to visit Andaman? The months from October to May happens to be the best time to visit Andaman and Nicobar Islands for all types of travelers.
